name: Beefburglar
description:
Welcome to Beefburglar!

Using WASD to move, Left Click to punch, and holding and releasing Right Click to throw your burger, you must fight off the enemies around you or simply evade them, while picking up extra fillings for your burger off the floor and sending them back to your cell by hitting Left Control while in front of a shiny vent! Use Left Shift to dash away if you're in a pinch, and good luck! If you're having trouble staying alive, have a look at the instructions as they'll help you out!

Thanks for playing and good luck! DM me on discord at BobblyBob#1383 with any feedback, suggestions or high scores you've got!
